pipeline.dsl.options package

pipeline.dsl.options.cache_options module

class pipeline.dsl.options.cache_options.CacheOptions(enable: bool = False, fs_scope: Optional[str] = None, max_expired_time: int = - 1)

Bases: pipeline.dsl.options.options.Options

The Cache Options of Pipeline or Step

Parameters

  • enable (bool) – indicate use cache or not, default is False

  • fs_scope (str) – the paths involved in the cachekey calculation (mainly to calculate whether the content under the path has changed). Multiple paths are divided by ‘,’ such as “/code,/data”

  • max_expired (int) – the maximum expiration time of the cache, in seconds, - 1 means permanently valid, default is -1

pipeline.dsl.options.failure_options module

class pipeline.dsl.options.failure_options.FailureOptions(strategy: str = 'fail_fast')

Bases: pipeline.dsl.options.options.Options

The FailureOptions of Pipeline: Specify how to handle the rest steps of the pipeline when there is any step failed

Parameters

strategy (str) –

support two kinds of strategy, default is “fail_fast”:

* "fail_fast": All job would be killed or cancelled
* "continue": the steps of other branch would be scheduled normally
